name: Model S
description: A premium all-electric sedan with long range, high performance, and cutting-edge autonomous driving capabilities.

name: Civic
description: A compact car known for its reliability, fuel efficiency, and modern safety features—ideal for daily commutes.

name: Mustang GT
description: An iconic American muscle car with a V8 engine, aggressive styling, and thrilling performance on road and track.

name: Prius
description: A pioneer in hybrid technology, the Prius offers impressive fuel economy and a comfortable ride for eco-conscious drivers.

name: Crown
description: A luxury sedan featuring refined interior design, cutting-edge technology, and smooth hybrid performance.

name: 3 Series
description: A dynamic sport sedan offering precision handling, turbocharged engines, and premium German craftsmanship.

name: Taycan
description: A high-performance electric sports car combining Porsche driving dynamics with cutting-edge EV technology.

name: Cullinan
description: A luxury SUV offering unmatched comfort, elegance, and power—crafted for elite travel experiences.

name: Model Y
description: A versatile electric crossover with spacious interior, long range, and smart tech like autopilot and over-the-air updates.

name: Centenario
description: A rare hypercar built to honor Lamborghini’s centenary—featuring carbon fiber body, V12 engine, and aggressive aerodynamics.

name: Atto 3
description: A stylish and high-tech compact electric SUV, the Atto 3 by BYD blends efficiency with modern design.

name: Oren Pippaw
description: A luxurious and rugged SUV, this Range Rover model embodies sophistication and off-road prowess.
